mapper.sql: id, mattressId, start, ende, intervale, ala
mapper.insert: insert into dailyAlarm (id, mattressId, start, ende, intervale, ala) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mattressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{start,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ende,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intervale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ala, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM dailyAlarm WHERE start >= STR_TO_DATE('startDate', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and ende <= STR_TO_DATE('endDate', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and mattressId = #{mattressId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY id LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
